scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && cp -R src dist
scripts.build: cd dist/coffee/ && for f in *.coffee; do f=${f%%.*}; cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify ${f}.coffee | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m > ../js/${f}.js; done
scripts.build:withsourcemaps: cd dist/coffee/ && for f in *.coffee; do f=${f%%.*}; cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify ${f}.coffee --debug | exorcist ../js/${f}.js.map > ../js/${f}.js && uglifyjs ../js/${f}.js -c warnings=false -m --in-source-map ../js/${f}.js.map --source-map ../js/${f}.js.map -o ../js/${f}.js; done
scripts.postbuild: rm -rf dist/node_modules && rm -rf dist/coffee && npm run postcss
